description:
Fact: 𝘊𝘩𝘪𝘤𝘬𝘦𝘯𝘴 𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘤𝘶𝘳𝘳𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘭𝘺 𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘪𝘦𝘳 𝘵𝘰 𝘵𝘢𝘭𝘬 𝘵𝘰 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘯 𝘮𝘰𝘴𝘵 𝘱𝘦𝘰𝘱𝘭𝘦. ⁣
⁣
~𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟎 𝐇𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬~⁣
⁣
• Get yourself some chickens ❤⁣
• Make Jesus your foundation⁣
• Love God - Love others⁣
• Learn how to grow your own food⁣
• Marinate in the Word⁣
• Dont listen to the Media⁣
• Do your own research⁣
• Pray with fervor + perseverance⁣
⁣
""""The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,"""" ⁣
Ephesians 1:18⁣
⁣
May we all have eyes, minds + hearts aligned with the will of God. ⁣Who is wholly GOOD + JUST.
⁣
May our actions originate from ⁣
𝘭𝘰𝘷𝘦 𝘯𝘰𝘵 𝘣𝘪𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘴 • 𝘚𝘦𝘭𝘧𝘭𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘴 𝘯𝘰𝘵 𝘱𝘳𝘪𝘥𝘦.⁣
⁣
""""Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them: for this is the law and the prophets.""""⁣
Matthew 7:12⁣
⁣
